property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in Holy level 3, War level 2, and all Holy Creatures. Dark Spells cost triple.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities: Valor; Once per round, when the Paladin melee attacks and damages the strongest enemy creature, he gains 1 Valor. Divine Auras As a quick action, the Paladin may gain an aura of his choice. Each aura has its own cost in Valor. Chivalrous Challenge During the Upkeep Phase, the Paladin may place his Challenge Marker on a target enemy creature within 2 zones. Once per round, the Paladin and his Challenged enemy may re-roll any number of their attack dice while melee attacking each other. If the Challenged enemy attacks any other object, gain 1 Valor. When the Challenged enemy is destroyed, return the marker to the Paladin. During the Upkeep Phase you may pay 2 Valor to return the Challenge marker from an enemy creature.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Water school, as well as pirate and song spells.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities: Siren's Call: As a Psychic Song quick spell the Siren may pay 1 mana to place her Siren's Call marker on target non-Mage creature within 2 zones. During its action phase that creature MUST move at least 1 zone closer to the Siren, if possible, and may not attack her. Return the marker at the end their Action Phase. Friendly aquatic creatures also gain Melee +2. Fermata: The Siren may extend an expiring song she controls by paying mana equal to its Level and placing a Fermata marker on it. The Siren may only have two songs affected by Fermata markers at a time, and each song may only be extended a maximum of up to 2 rounds. Amphibious: The Siren gains Regenerate 1 while in zones with aquatic terrain attached.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Tsunami is cast, choose a direction. After the attack resolves, repeat the attack one zone farther away in the chosen direction. This continues until there are no farther zones. Flying Creatures are immune to Tsunami

property.name: Text
property.value: Bed of Urchins attacks each Non-Flying creature immediately after they enter the zone. Aquatic creatures are immune to the Venomous Spines attack if there is an Aquatic terrain attached to this zone.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Paladin Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-flame ranged attacks roll 2 less dice (to a minimum of 1) against Crusade Banner. During the Deployment Phase, it may summon exactly 2 Holy creatures. If it does, destroy Crusade Banner.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a creature you control is attacked and damaged by an enemy creature, place a Valor token on Temple of Meraveran. Once per round, during the Upkeep Phase you may remove exactly 3 Valor tokens from this temple to give all friendly Holy creatures in the arena Melee +1 this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, target enemy creature gains the Light +1 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Holy Fire;range type=Ranged;range=(0,0);damage type=Light;dice=4;effects={7: ['Daze'], 9: ['Burn']};Ethereal=True;+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures=True

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Holy Fire: [Ranged:0-0] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-8 = Daze; 9+ = Burn] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: When Pillar of Righteous Flame is cast, or a Dissipate token is removed, it attacks an enemy creature in its zone. Pillar of Righteous Flame attacks each enemy creature immediately after they enter the zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: All non-Flying non-aquatic creatures in this zone gain the Restrained and Unmovable traits. During the Upkeep Phase, they receive 2 direct hydro damage. Remove all Burn conditions from creatures damaged by Whirlpool. Uncontainable creatures are not affected by Whirlpool.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Initiative, all pirate creatures gain Melee +1 and Ranged +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, non-Holy enemy creatures in this zone receive 1 direct light damage. Friendly Holy creatures in this zone gain the Regenerate 1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Other Non-flying objects in this zone gain the Obscured trait. Attacks against Non-Flying animal creatures in this zone roll 2 less attack dice. Non-Flying, non-animal creatures in this zone are hindered.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aquatic creatures in this zone gain Melee +1. Non-Flying Non-aquatic creatures in this zone are hindered and roll 1 less die when making non-spell attacks.

property.name: Text
property.value: LoS which passes through two sides of this zone is blocked. All non-Flying creatures in this zone gain the Ranged +1 trait. Non-Flying creatures require a full action to move into this zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Flying, non-aquatic creatures in this zone have the Slow and Unmovable traits, and lose and cannot gain the Elusive trait.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Guided Spear;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(1,2);damage type=Light;dice=4;effects={5: ['Daze']};Ethereal=True;Unavoidable=True;+2 Vs. Nonliving Creatures=True||name=Thrown Spear;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(1,2);dice=4

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Guided Spear: [Full] [Ranged:1-2] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [5+ = Daze] [Ethereal] [Unavoidable] [+2 Vs. Nonliving Creatures] Thrown Spear: [Full] [Ranged:1-2] [Dice=4]

property.name: Text
property.value: When making a Guided Spear attack, you must pay 1 mana. Artemis' attacks ignore the Obscured trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blightheart's attacks against inactive creatures gain +4 to the effect roll. This does not effect counterstrikes.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Alandell is activated, you may pay up to 4 mana. If you do, he gains Melee +1 and adds +1 to his effect rolls for each mana spent, until the end of the activation.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Aegis 1, Familiar, Flying, Legendary, Holy Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Cassiel can only cast Healing and Protection Spells.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Grabbing Claw;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=2;effects={7: ['Grapple']}||name=Crushing Claw;action type=Full;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, Colossal Crab's prey receives 2 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Dawnbreaker's Initiate is destroyed by an enemy controlled attack or effect, you may teleport your Mage or a Holy creature you control, in the arena, to this zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a creature in this zone has a Bleed condition, Razor Claws gain the Doublestrike trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a deptonne in this zone melee attacks a creature with the Bleed condition for the first time each round, its attack gains the Vampiric trait for that attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, Dorseus may heal another friendly living creature in this zone 2 damage. This bypasses the Finite Life trait.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Wrenching Claws;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=2;effects={5: ['Grapple']}||name=Tail Spike;action type=Full;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4;Piercing +X=2

property.name: Text
property.value: The Tail Spike attack rolls 2 additional attack dice when attacking the Drokarr's prey.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, when making a counterstrike, Eligor gains the Melee +2 trait and Martial Strike gains the Piercing +1 trait for that attack.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Avaricious Strike;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4;Piercing +X=1 per Gold token on Gerard

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Avaricious Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [Piercing +1 per Gold token on Gerard]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, and when Gerard attacks and damages an enemy creature, he gains 1 Gold token. Your Mage may spend Gold tokens as mana when they summon Soldier or Pirate creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knight of the Red Helm gains Melee +2 when attacking the Strongest enemy creature.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Tentacle Grasp;action type=Quick;range type=Ranged;range=( 0,1);dice=3;effects={5: ['Grapple + Snatch']}||name=Devouring Beak;action type=Full;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=6;Piercing +X=3

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Tentacle Grasp: [Quick] [Ranged: 0-1] [Dice=3] [d12] [5+ = Grapple + Snatch] Devouring Beak: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=6] [Piercing +3]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Aegis 1, Flying, Legendary, Holy Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Melee +X and Regen X, X = the number of friendly temple conjurations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Naiya can cast only non-creature Water spells or song spells. While Naiya is in a zone with an Aquatic terrain attached, she gains Regenerate 1 and Channeling +1.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Quick Snap;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4;effects={5: ['Grapple']}||name=Death Roll;action type=Full;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=5;effects={4: ['Bleed']}

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Quick Snap: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [d12] [5+ = Grapple] Death Roll: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=5] [d12] [4+ = Bleed]

property.name: Text
property.value: The Death Roll attack can only attack Shoalsdeep Crocodile's prey.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Initiative, Shoalsdeep Tidecaller gains the Melee +2 trait, and adds +4 to Riptide's effect rolls.

property.name: Text
property.value: When guarding, Temple High Guard gains Melee +2 and may counterstrike first (the Counterstrike Step is moved to just after the Declare Attack Step).

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Blighted Cutlass;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=3;effects={7: ['Rot']}||name=Magic Flintlock;action type=Full;range type=Ranged;range=(1,1);dice=3;Piercing +X=2

property.name: Traits
property.value: Burnproof, Frost +3, Hydro Immunity, Nonliving, Resilient, Unstoppable

property.name: Text
property.value: When Water Elemental pushes a creature, after the Push, it may immediately move into that creature's zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature attacks and damages an object, you must reveal Blind. When this creature attacks, during the Roll to Miss step, roll the effect die. If the roll is a 6 or less, the attack misses.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, Drown gains 1 Suffocation token. X = the number of Suffocation tokens

property.name: Text
property.value: Eye for an Eye can only be revealed before the Roll Dice Step of an attack. During the Damage and Effects Step, the attacker suffers the same damage and effects as the defender. Then, destroy Eye for an Eye.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, heal all friendly living creatures in this zone 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature cannot be Hindered and gains the Charge +2 and Fast traits. [Charge +2] [Fast]

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy creature enters this zone, Hydrothermal Vent must be revealed. Make the above attack, then destroy Hydrothermal Vent. The reveal cost is lowered by 1 if enchanting a zone with an aquatic terrain attached.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attacking the strongest enemy creature, this creature gains Melee +2 and its attacks gain Piercing +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, the controller of Life Link may heal up to 3 damage from this creature and place it on himself as direct damage, regardless of distance or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, roll the effect die. On a 7+ this creature gains a Stun Condition, otherwise it gains a Daze Condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chant of Rage cannot be revealed during an Action Phase. When Chant of Rage is revealed, place a Hate token on one of your creatures. During its activation this creature must melee attack a creature with a Hate token. If it cannot, then it must move towards a creature with a Hate token, if possible. When this spell is destroyed, destroy a Hate token in play on a friendly creature, if possible. X = Creature's level -1

property.name: Text
property.value: Song of Love cannot be revealed during an Action Phase. When Song of Love is revealed, place a Love token on a friendly creature. Enchanted creature cannot make a melee or ranged attack against a creature with a Love token. When this spell is destroyed, destroy a Love token in play on a friendly creature, if possible. X = Creature's level -1

property.name: Text
property.value: When you attack and destroy your Challenged enemy, gain Valor equal to its Level. Once per round, when you attack your Challenged enemy, gain 1 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: Equipment objects in this Mage's Weapon, Ring and Shield slots cannot be destroyed by an opponent's effects. When Champion's Gauntlets would be destroyed by an opponent's effect, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Mage gains a Defense and the Intercept trait. When this Mage intercepts an enemy attack, gain 1 Valor. [Defense 7+ 1x]

property.name: Text
property.value: When a non-Mage friendly creature in your zone is attacked and damaged, you may pay 1 mana. If you do, the attacker receives 1 direct light damage, regardless of range or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Hydro -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Hydro -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Mage casts a Healing incantation, heal this Mage 1 damage. When a Healing incantation cast by your Mage heals 4 or more damage off a friendly non-Mage creature, gain 1 Valor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2. At the end of this Mage's Action Phase, he or she may pay 2 mana to gain a Guard Marker. [Armor +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts or reveals a hydro or aquatic spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have the Initiative, when this Mage makes a hydro attack, that attack rolls 1 additional attack die and adds +2 to the effect roll.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value:
Spearpoint Thrust: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [d12] [5+ = Push] [Piercing +2]
Wave Blast: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Hydro] [Dice=3] [d12] [5+ = Push] [Extinguish]

property.name: Text
property.value: This Mage gains the Unmovable and Anchored traits. [Unmovable] [Anchored]

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Radiant Slash;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);damage type=Light;dice=4;effects={10: ['Daze'], 13: ['Burn']};Ethereal=True;+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures=True

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Radiant Slash: [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [10-12 = Daze; 13+ = Burn] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: When you declare an attack with Radiant Slash, you may spend a Valor to add +6 to your effect roll. When the Radiant Slash deals 5 or more damage, gain 1 Valor Token.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a song enchantment, Triton's Horn gains Channeling +1. During the Deployment Phase, Echo of the Depths may Summon 1 Water creature. If Echo of the Depths would be destroyed by an opponent's spell or effect, prevent that destruction, unless your opponent pays 2 mana for each song enchantment you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts of reveals a song spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. When you reveal a song spell, you may place an extra dissipate token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove up to 5 damage from target creature and place it on the caster of this spell. This effect bypasses the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature, without attached conjurations, is Teleported to a target zone up to 1 zone away from its current zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature heals the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Then, heal target creature within 1 zone of the first creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Then, heal target creature withing 1 zone of the second creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Mending Wave can't target the same creature twice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Overextend can only target an inactive creature. Flip the creature's action marker face-up. After that creature's next activation, it gains a Stun condition. You can only cast this one time per round on the same creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Smite, you must pay 4 Valor. Your next melee attack this round, deals critical damage, gains the Unavoidable trait, and rolls 2 additional attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Dissolve, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. X = equipment's casting cost. Then, destroy the chosen equipment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy the target. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost).
